meanings.definition: The upper lateral region of the abdomen on either side of the epigastrium.
meanings.sent1: He felt a sharp pain in his hypochondrium after eating too much.
meanings.sent2: The doctor gently pressed on her hypochondrium during the examination.
meanings.sent3: The hypochondrium seemed to have a mind of its own, causing unexpected discomfort.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, reaching every corner of her hypochondrium.
meanings.sent5: The hypochondrium, like a protective shield, guarded her internal organs from harm.
